version_description:
UI rework to support proper scrolling, drag/drop reordering (via long-press) and modal editing.

Fix a crash when selecting a new image.
Minor release with fixes for iOS 12 ( Camera and gallery permissions ).

Backup and Restore - Tokens can be backed up and restored by taking an encrypted backup to a computer or iCloud - 'Encrypted' must be checked/enabled
New Token Icon feature
Scan Token navigation wizard
Swipe Token right gesture token removal
Reworked UI Navigation on iPhone and iPad
Edit button and manual token addition removed
Faster scrolling through tokens list

Vini Soares(1)
  Improve and modernize tokens list UI

Justin Stephenson(5)
  Add FaceID biometric unlock support
  Add about FreeOTP informational scene
  Fix collection view crash upon device rotation
  Fix system color in copy to clipboard UI
  Use system gray background for migrated tokens

- Fixed an issue with encrypted backup and restore of locked tokens
- Improved token reordering
- Support for 7 and 9 digit OTPs
Revert changes affecting locked tokens authentication
New Tokens Search bar feature(thanks to GitHub user @mul1sh)
Fixes an issue with Photo Library privacy settings.
